originalText.text:
Disclaimer: the small round piece you see on the photo on top of the kalimba is a contact mic used to record it. It is not included in the package you purchase.

Here is my review for the 'CHILL ANGELS 36 KEY VIBRATO BOX CHROMATIC KALIMBA'.

Short version
You can buy it with your eyes closed, all the tines sound good, the sound is beautiful. The tuning for the second layer takes a little time to get used to but otherwise the instrument is very nice and looks solid. The kalimba also comes with a carrying case, pliers and a hammer for tuning and stickers for marking the notes.

Longer version
To give you some background, I have been playing the kalimba for about 3 months now. Although not an expert, I already have 4 kalimbas, 2 of them chromatic, all different brands. I can play complex pieces, requiring chords and glissando.

I bought this kalimba because I was not so satisfied with my other chromatic kalimbas. Indeed, although they had a nice sound on the low notes, the high notes did not come out well, if at all. This problem is completely solved with this one, all the tines work well, the sound is clear and more powerful than on flat board kalimbas.

The kalimba arrived in about a week (I had taken the option of delivery by DHL) and was in very good condition. It is delivered in a very nice box that protects the instrument well and we receive by mail a small booklet for beginners when ordering.  The instrument is well secured inside, with small pieces of cardboard/wood that protect the tines from shocks/vibrations during transport. Contrary to the other kalimbas I bought, the kalimba was perfectly tuned when I received the package, which is impressive for a package that went from China to France.

As an accessory, we have a nice carrying case as well as pliers and a hammer for tuning. Finally, you can use stickers, included in the package, to mark the notes on the kalimba.

I've had it for about a month now and it still works perfectly.

In summary, if you are looking for a solid, good quality instrument with an excellent sound, I can only recommend this one!
